channel.description: This chapter describes the following major topics: [ {.c37}]{.c36}Understand container technology [ {.c37}]{.c36}Identify key Linux features that establish the foundation to run containers [ {.c37}]{.c36}Analyze container benefits [ {.c37}]{.c36}A better home for containers [ {.c37}]{.c36}Grasp the concepts of container images and registries [ {.c37}]{.c36}Compare pros and cons of root and rootless containers [ {.c37}]{.c36}Examine registry configuration file [ {.c37}]{.c36}Work with container images (find, inspect, pull, list, and delete) [ {.c37}]{.c36}Administer basic containers (start, list, stop, remove, interact with, run commands from outside, attach to, run custom entry point commands, etc.
